General.Name: Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited
General.Description: Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of sugar in Thailand, Asia, Europe, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Sugar Cane, Sugar and Molasses Trading, and Utilities. The Sugar Cane segment produces and distributes sugar cane, as well as provides agricultural machines and vehicles to planters. The Sugar and Molasses Trading segment purchases and sells sugar, molasses, and by products. The Utilities segment is involved in the generation of electricity and steam using bagasse as fuel. Its products include refined, white, brown, and raw sugar. The company also manufactures and distributes ethanol; and provides knowledge seminars to planters. Khonburi Sugar Public Company Limited was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
